thread.title: U.S. Senate rejects immigration bills after Trump veto threat

title: U.S. Senate rejects immigration bills after Trump veto threat
text:
U.S. Senate rejects immigration bills after Trump veto threat Thursday, February 15, 2018 - 00:26 
The U.S. Senate failed to advance any legislation to protect ''Dreamer'' immigrants on Thursday, falling short of the 60 votes needed to move forward on four proposals including one backed by President Donald Trump and two bipartisan measures. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
